nio/DHT22.description: For use with the [DHT22](http://dlnmh9ip6v2uc.cloudfront.net/datasheets/Sensors/Weather/RHT03.pdf) (also called AM2302), a digital relative humidty and temperature sensor.

pin_number.title: Pin Number
pin_number.description: Select which pin the DHT is connected on.

default.description: Appends `temperature` and `humidity` values to the input signal.
